scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:sass && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp index.html build/index.html && cp -r img build/img && mkdir build/js/ && cp js/bundle.js build/js/bundle.js && cp js/geo_era.json build/js/geo_era.json && cp js/metadata.json build/js/metadata.json && mkdir build/js/views && cp js/views/*.html build/js/views && mkdir build/js/directives && cp js/directives/*.html build/js/directives && mkdir build/styles && cp styles/main.css build/styles/main.css
scripts.dev: npm run sass-vendor-copy && npm run dev:js-watch & npm run dev:sass-watch & npm run dev:local-server
scripts.sass-vendor-copy: mkdir -p styles/vendor/leaflet && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css styles/vendor/leaflet/leaflet.scss && cp node_modules/leaflet.fullscreen/Control.FullScreen.css styles/vendor/leaflet/Control.FullScreen.scss && mkdir -p styles/vendor/slick  && cp node_modules/slick-carousel/slick/slick.scss styles/vendor/slick/slick.scss
